instructions: On your Pixel phone: Tap Start . Connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile carrier. Tap Copy your data . Turn on and unlock your current phone. Plug one end of a cable into your current phone. Plug the cable's other end into your Pixel phone. Or plug it into the Quick Switch Adapter and plug the adapter into your Pixel phone. On your current phone, tap Copy . Follow the on-screen steps. On your Pixel phone, you'll see a list of your data. To copy all your data, tap Copy . To copy only some data, first turn off what you don't want. Then tap Copy . When your transfer's done, you'll get a notification.
